channel.title: Server logins
channel.description:
Hey all I am very much new to this moparscape and I was wandering how do you join these servers that are promoted and stuff?
I downloaded that client Aryan but it seems unable to join any sort of servers and also I tried logging in from servers list but Java security of some sort blocks all ... Except real runescape client. :(
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Server logins
item.dc:creator: @jasamrambo jasamrambo
item.description:
@jasamrambo wrote:

Yes thank you downloading server clients is what helped.

Considering Java since it has been updated there are no more Medium Security settings only High and Very High , from which both seem to block browser untrusted Java apps… Shame really.

Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.title: Server logins
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

They will usually provide a download link to their own clients, or it will be on their website and you will need to download that to connect.

Try and lower your security settings if you can’t download them.

Read full topic
